means: 米开朗基罗(1475-1564，意大利文艺复兴时期成就卓著的科学家，艺术家)

sentence.Network_en: Art is an acquired taste — no one is born knowing that Michelangelo is wonderful.
sentence.Network_cn: 艺术是一种后天养成的兴趣,没有人生来就知道米开朗基罗作品的美妙.

sentence.Network_en: Is this painting attributable to Michelangelo?
sentence.Network_cn: 这幅画是米开朗琪罗画的 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Michelangelo, while working, had to lie on his back and paint.
sentence.Network_cn: 米开朗基罗, 而工作时, 曾趴在他的背部及油漆.
